amendment.description: An amendment numbered 122 printed in House Report 115-217 to reinstate the Berry Amendment's longstanding domestic sourcing requirement for stainless steel flatware and provides for a one year phase-in period.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tenney amendment (A038) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Tenney amendment (A038) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A038) offered by Ms. Tenney.
